section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the interlocutory disposition to announce in No. 8 Original, the State of Arizona against the State of California.
Now, the Court today has ordered first that Circuit Judge -- Senior Circuit Judge Elbert Tuttle, the appointed Special Master.
And second, the disposition of the various motions of the parties including motions to intervene are fully described in the per curiam opinion the Court filed with the clerk this morning.
Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or the decision in this matter.
